interactivity.requirements: 15 Karin Affection You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen Main Events up to " What Was "

progression.synopsis: Soccer practice has been cancelled, but Karin is there anyway because she guessed that Sensei doesn't read his emails and would be there too. He suggests that it would be easier for her to just text him. He asks if they can go somewhere warmer, and Karin shows him a place. Sensei asks about her early life, and she tells him that her oldest memory involves her sister â€” he isn't surprised. Karin wants to keep improving her ability to talk to him, and will try to summon the courage to arrange something via text message.
trivia: The conversation varies depending on whether or not Sensei was honest when Karin asked him if anything was happening between him and her sister.

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.14.
